description:
+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

Do you struggle to understand how to sell online?

Is it important to you to increase your leads, conversions and sales?

Do you find all the different platforms, jargon, processes confusing?

If this is a summary of how you feel - I totally understand because four years ago I felt exactly the same - and decided that I had to figure it out!

+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

But - Anyone CAN do this! - You just need to understand HOW it works!

This is why I created this Online Marketing Plan Video Course - to show you what I have learned from years of experience and testing!

+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

All you need to do is take your digital product, apply the 8 Step formula and you WILL get results.

Here's just a taste of what you're about to discover:

  • The Six Core Principles You MUST apply when you create your own Online Marketing Plan
  • How to Design the Six Key elements you need to include in your Product Portfolio
  • The Six Essential Steps you need to take to generate a never ending flood of traffic, sales and income using Social Media.

+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

Here's what people are saying The Six Minute Strategist:

Simon Dixon, CEO and Co-Founder of BankToTheFuture wrote â€œI have met many Investment Bankers in my time, but very few that understand the power of the internet and social media."

+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

Are you ready to Get Started?

I normally charge $250 an hour for my personal consulting services, but there is a limit on my time and the number of people I can help personally.

So I created this Video Course to allow everyone access to the vital business knowledge that I've learned doing the marketing for my own business.

+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

So if you're ready to make a change and finally get your online business on the path to success, just click the Blue "Take This Course" button in the top right hand corner of this page.

+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

And of course, when you purchase your copy of The Online Marketing Plan you won't risk a cent. The course comes with Udemy's unconditional 30 day money back guarantee.

If you find that the course doesn't meet your needs, all you have to do is ask Udemy for a Refund.

No questions asked, no hoops to jump through and no hard feelings...

Look, if you're serious about starting an online business and generating a real online income, you need to take action and get in the game.

+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

You can finally put an end to all your frustration and disappointment simply by following the 8 step approach revealed in The Online Marketing Plan .

+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

Imagine opening your email inbox every morning and seeing a flood of new sales notifications from around the world. You then flick over to your online banking and see the cold hard cash piling up in your account faster than you've ever seen before.

That's what I want for you, and I know it's what you want for yourself, so grab your copy of The Online Marketing Plan now and let's get you started today!

Click the Blue "Take This Course" button in the top right hand corner of this page right now and I'll see you on the other side...
title: Online Marketing Plan How to Get More Online Leads and Sales
